Description.Text:
Position One of the best hotels in Sestri Levante, situated in a panoramic position about 200 m from the sea and approx. 100 m from the center.
Restaurant Treatment: BB, HB or FB, buffet breakfast menu and a choice of 4 courses (appetizer for lunch and dinner). Seafood specialties every day with excellent food and Ligurian specialties.

More Informations It has: reception, bar with elegant lounges, elevator, elegant restaurant, garden, pool bar, elevator leading from the beach. Parking included. Park of 160,000 square meters with a path to the beach park. Facilities: swimming pool with natural sea water obtained from an indentation in the rock open from approx. middle of May until end of September, exclusive beach with large rocks and terraces overhanging the sea, with entry and Joint Unit included in the price.
